sentence: Excellent room dinner and morning swim can not beat this facility and location for seeing Richmond
The pool is really nice with a retractable roof
The hotel itself offers good food excellent service a quiet pool and if you are on the higher floors great views of Richmond
The pool was delightful also on the third floor
We loved the outdoor deck next to the indoor pool area and enjoyed a relaxing afternoon in the sun
Great time sorry the pool closed for a couple days during our stay
hotel was pretty especially the pool with all the amenities
We also liked the pool which was a great place to relax
On the pros the pool area was nice and the beds were comfortable
Restaurant and pool on premises
The pool was closed which was big bummer for my kids
The only amenity that we utilized was the pool
We did not use the pool facilities but did check them out and they also looked well maintained
The swimming pool was out of order
I have been an out of town regular at this hotel for the past 3 years but have stayed away for the past 5 months due to an inoperable pool
I prefer open air but it did not stop me from swimming and enjoying the water

Our card key to get us to the 19th floor did not work properly our toilet clogged up the windows were very dirty the fan in the AC unit was very noisy we never did figure out where the pool was the phone did not work for valet concierge etc you had to hit 0 for the operator our original room on the 18th floor faced a construction site We had to request a river view room
I thought it might have something to do with the pool being on our floor but man was it overpowering
There is a nice indoor pool on the 3rd floor that was not being used while I was there
No outdoor pool no place to get a pop
The pool was nice but no hot tub and the gym was off site but nearby
The pool was below par also they had rented it to a birthday party which made it very crowded almost to a level we could n’t use it
The pool while heated includes a retract roof windows that were open when it was 30 degrees outside
I thought I had requested a high room but we got 3rd floor looking out to the pool deck
